II.iii.2.G.2.d
.
Fractures Discovered in STRs Without a Claim
Fractures constitute a chronic disability for the purposes of soliciting a claim.
If the Veteran has not claimed a fracture and STRs contain an x-ray or other objective evidence of a fracture in service, solicit a claim from the Veteran in accordance with
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.G.2.e
.
Reference
:Â  For more information on SC for fractures documented in service, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 1.F.1.a
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section G - Requests for Application and Claims Solicitation
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section G
